lead_paragraph: West Ham United have won an appeal against the red card shown to midfielder Cheikhou Kouyate during Sunday's FA Cup fifth-round win at Blackburn Rovers.

headline.print_headline: West Ham Win Appeal Over Kouyate Red Card
headline.main: West Ham Win Appeal Over Kouyate Red Card
